name: Real Bike Racing -City Racing free game
name_original: Real Bike Racing -City Racing free game
description:
Congratulate yourself for having a Real Bike with you,by Speed in city and in traffic there are a lot obstacles to reach the goal in case you don't have the extreme speed bike with you as asphalt .Race against you and drive carefully to avoid accident with the evil cars. Feel zoom and real excitement with the speed and Thrill.

If you are a city driver then you have to drive through the curly roads and tracks with the lot of Trucks , cars and extreme speedy bikes too.show them your speed with the Top racing game of the year.
